items.description: Array of items in the collection

bundled.description: True if the opencollection is a standalone file, false if stored on the filesystem with nested structure of folders and files

Extensions.description: Free-form object that allows implementers to extend the spec

summary.description: A short summary of the collection

authors.description: Array of authors of the collection

RequestDefaults.description: Default request configuration for the collection/folder

headers.description: Array of http headers, sent with http, graphql, websocket requests

metadata.description: Array of gRPC metadata, sent with grpc requests

clientCertificates.description: Array of client certificates for mutual TLS authentication

importPaths.description: Array of proto file import paths

PemCertificate.description: Client certificate using separate PEM-encoded cert and key files

domain.description: The domain this certificate applies to

privateKeyFilePath.description: Path to the private key file

domain.description: The domain this certificate applies to

disabled.description: Whether the import path is disabled

type.description: The MIME type of the content

Sequence.description: Sequence number used to represent the order of the item when rendered in UI

type.description: The MIME type of the content

HttpRequestHeader.description: Http header with name, value, description, and disabled state

HttpResponseHeader.description: Http response header with name and value

GrpcMetadata.description: A gRPC metadata entry with name, value, description, and disabled state

GrpcRequestMessage.description: A gRPC request message with description and data

GrpcMessageVariant.description: A variant of gRPC message with title, selected state, and message

WebSocketMessage.description: A WebSocket message with type and data

WebSocketMessageVariant.description: A variant of WebSocket message with title, selected state, and message

HttpRequestParam.description: A request parameter with name, value, description, type, and disabled state

HttpRequestBodyVariant.description: A variant of HTTP request body with title, selected state, and body

RawBody.description: Raw request body with type and data

type.description: The type of raw body content

data.description: Form fields as array of key-value pairs

disabled.description: Whether the form field is disabled
Whether the form part is disabled

data.description: Files as array of file objects

FileBodyVariant.description: A file variant with path, content type, and selection state

GraphQLBody.description: GraphQL request body with query and variables

GraphQLBodyVariant.description: A variant of GraphQL body with title, selected state, and body

OAuth2TokenPlacement.description: Where the token is placed in requests

OAuth2TokenConfig.description: Configuration for how OAuth 2.0 tokens are stored and transported with downstream requests

id.description: Reference identifier for the token (used to access it via scripting APIs)

autoFetchToken.description: Automatically fetch a new token when you try to access the resource and don't have one

autoRefreshToken.description: Automatically refresh your token using the refreshTokenUrl when it expires

placement.description: Where credentials are placed in the request

OAuth2PKCE.description: PKCE (Proof Key for Code Exchange) configuration

accessTokenUrl.description: URL to fetch the access token

OAuth2ResourceOwnerPasswordFlow.description: OAuth 2.0 Resource Owner Password Credentials flow

accessTokenUrl.description: URL to fetch the access token
URL to fetch the access token

callbackUrl.description: URL to callback to after authorization

state.description: Opaque value used for CSRF protection

callbackUrl.description: URL to callback to after authorization

credentials.description: Client credentials (implicit flow only needs clientId)

state.description: Opaque value used for CSRF protection

placement.description: Where to place the API key

Tag.description: A tag for categorizing or labeling items

maxRedirects.description: Maximum number of redirects to follow
Maximum number of redirects to follow

RequestSettings.description: Request settings for different request types

assertions.description: Array of assertions for response validation

examples.description: Array of example HTTP request/response pairs

assertions.description: Array of assertions for response validation

url.description: The gRPC service URL or endpoint

assertions.description: Array of assertions for response validation

Folder.description: A folder for organizing collection items

items.description: Array of items in the folder

ScriptFile.description: Javascript module or shared collection scripts

Script.description: A script to execute at a specific lifecycle stage

type.description: The lifecycle stage when this script executes

clientCertificates.description: Array of client certificates for mutual TLS authentication

extends.description: The name of the environment to extend from

dotEnvFilePath.description: Path to a .env file to load variables from

Variable.description: A variable with name, value, description, and state flags

SecretVariable.description: A secret variable with name, type, description, and state flags

secret.description: Indicates this is a secret variable

type.description: The data type of the secret variable

data.description: The string representation of the value

VariableValue.description: A variable value (string or typed object)

VariableValueVariant.description: A variant of variable value with title, selected state, and value
